snippet: The effort showed the determination of asylum seekers to gain a coherent policy that will help them make their journeys and save lives.
abstract: Group of almost 8,000 Syrian refugees gather in Edirne, Turkey, by Greek border, hoping sheer numbers will bolster their effort to cross by land into Greece; is part of movement called Crossing No More that was organized through Facebook and which seeks to avoid dangers of sea crossings that have claimed nearly 3,000 lives this year; gathering is dispersed by Turkish officials.
lead_paragraph: The effort showed the determination of asylum seekers to gain a coherent policy that will help them make their journeys and save lives.

headline.main: Facebook Group’s Push for Safe Land Passage for Migrants Founders
headline.print_headline: Linked by Facebook, Migrants Press in Vain for a Safe Passage by Land

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
